display_name: Childhood Adenotonsillectomy Trial (CHAT) Obstructive and Mixed Apnea Index (AHI): (Obstructive apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ mixed apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60*(oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + marbp4 + marop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4) / slpprdp
